item.title: Link: Jonson
item.dc:creator: Tim Weber
item.description:
Thanks for the nice feed­back on Twit­ter re­gard­ing the launch of this site!

Just a few hours lat­er, some­body had al­ready mailed me about an in­ter­est­ing guy who calls him­self Jon­son and the list of ve­hi­cles he lived in since 1982(!). It’s cer­tain­ly in­spir­ing, thanks! The site is in Ger­man on­ly, but the pho­tos tell some in­ter­est­ing sto­ries all by them­selves.

To­mor­row we’ll be head­ing to Wohn­mo­bile Ed­er (Ger­man on­ly) in Bad U­rach to pick up the West­falia Club Jok­er we’ve rent­ed for 10 days. Then, we’re driv­ing to Paris and back­. ­Ex­pect quite a few up­dates in the next days!
